verses.roman:
ghāghara, kiṅkiṇī bāje, ghaṇṭāra kvaṇita
nānā citra-paṭṭa-vastre ratha vibhūṣita

synonyms: ghāghara—gongs; kiṅkiṇī—ankle bells; bāje—were sounding; ghaṇṭāra—of bells; kvaṇita—tinkling sound; nānā—various; citra—pictures; paṭṭa-vastre—with silken cloth; ratha—the car; vibhūṣita—decorated.
translation: The car was also decorated with silken cloth and various pictures. Many brass bells, gongs and ankle bells rang.
